select orc.Exchange_Time,orc.Delivery_Time, mi.Logname, case when mi.Member_Type = 0 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Name),#{map.skey})) using utf8) when mi.Member_Type = 1 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ci.Compang_Name),#{map.skey})) using utf8) end as Personal_Name , case when mi.Member_Type = 0 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Phone),#{map.skey})) using utf8) when mi.Member_Type = 1 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbicom.Personal_Phone),#{map.skey})) using utf8) end as Personal_Phone, comminfo.Commodity_NO,comminfo.Commodity_Name,cor.Quantity,comminfo.Need_Point,orc.Order_Type, (select Quantity from Integral_Records where Integral_Direction = -1 and Integral_Event_ID = orc.Order_ID and Delete_Flag = 1 and Integral_Type =5) as realPoint from Order_Records orc left join Member_Info mi on mi.Member_ID = orc.Member_ID left join Personal_Base_Info pbi on pbi.Personal_ID = mi.Personal_ID and mi.Member_Type =0 left join Company_Info ci on ci.Company_ID = mi.Company_ID and mi.Member_Type =1 left join Personal_Base_Info pbicom on pbicom.Personal_Id = ci.Legal_ID join Commodity_Order cor on cor.Order_ID = orc.Order_ID left join Commodity_Info comminfo on comminfo.Commodity_ID = cor.Commodity_ID
orc.Order_Type = 3
comminfo.Commodity_Name like '%${map.commodityName}%'
and comminfo.Commodity_NO=#{map.commodityNO}
and orc.Exchange_Time >#{map.ExchangestartTime}
and orc.Exchange_Time <#{map.ExchangeendTime}
and orc.Delivery_Time >#{map.DeliverystartTime}
and orc.Delivery_Time <#{map.DeliveryendTime}
and mi.Logname like '%${map.logname}%'
and (ci.Compang_Name like '%${map.memberName}%' or pbi.Personal_Name like '%${map.memberName}%')
and (pbi.Personal_Phone like '%${map.personalPhone}%' or pbicom.Personal_Phone like '%${map.personalPhone}%')
and orc.Order_Type = #{map.orderType}
order by orc.Exchange_Time desc
order by orc.Exchange_Time asc
order by orc.Delivery_Time desc
order by orc.Delivery_Time asc
order by cor.Quantity desc
order by cor.Quantity asc
order by orc.Delivery_Time desc
order by orc.Delivery_Time asc
order by comminfo.Need_Point desc
order by comminfo.Need_Point asc

select sa.Address_ID as addressId , sa.Member_ID as memberId , Province as province , pd.Province_Name as provinceName , cd.City_Name as cityName , cod.County_Name as countyName , City as city , County as county , Street as street , Detailed_Address as detailedAddress , Postcode as postcode , Contact_Name as contactName , Contact_Phone as contactPhone , Contact_Email as contactEmail , Delivery_Choice as deliveryChoice , IS_Default_Address as iSDefaultAddress from Order_Records orc left join Shipping_address sa on orc.Address_ID= sa.Address_ID left join Province_Dictionary pd on sa.Province = pd.province_Id left join City_Dictionary cd on cd.City_id = sa.City left join County_Dictionary cod on cod.County_Id = sa.County where orc.Order_ID =#{orderID}
